title: e*thirteen XCX Race Gravel wheels hit 1,280g with new ultralight carbon rims
content:
The all-new e*thirteen XCX gravel wheels borrow a few tricks from their mountain bike lineup, but they introduce an insanely light 320g gravel rim, plus new lighter hubs and complete builds. In fact, the XCX Race Gravel wheels come in at a claimed 1,280g for the set! That’s among the lightest gravel bike wheelset out […]

The post e*thirteen XCX Race Gravel wheels hit 1,280g with new ultralight carbon rims appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
